name: Wild Animal Hunting: 3D Sniper Safari Simulation
name_original: Wild Animal Hunting: 3D Sniper Safari Simulation
description:
The wild super hunter is back, this time with advanced shooting skills and more realistic environment, enjoy the real roar of the wild forest in two different natural sceneries.

You have to hunt the wild animal roaming free in the thick forest. with a variety of weapon shotgun, sniper rifle and many more. Enjoy the dual mode game where you can test your shooting skills.

The best fluent game controls and the realistic 3D view of the jungle will test your skill of shooting the target while moving. the attack mode will enable the animal to attack you back if you fire at them. Be quick and precise while aiming a shooting because the wild animal will fight back this time for their survival.

The most wanted wild animal hunting game is out for free on IOS platforms. Aim your target with highly advanced verity of rifles. Play different and challenging missions to kill the animal without being identified and attacked. Be careful of the animal as they will also attack to protect their field.


Features:

▪ Smooth 3D game controls
▪ User friendly GUI and environment
▪ Different advance sniper guns and weapons
▪ Multiple exciting and challenging missions
▪ Amazing AI and realistic sound effects
